briefdescription.para: Frees all allocated resources and performs cleanup tasks for the game.

detaileddescription.para: Shuts down the entire game and frees associated resources.

briefdescription.para: Initializes all necessary parts and subsystems for the game.

detaileddescription.para: First initializes IO handler to show a splash screen, then initializes the rest of the systems sequentially.

simplesect.para: An exit code indicating success or the specific failure that occurred.

briefdescription.para: Main entry point for the application.

detaileddescription.para: This function initializes the game, runs the main game loop, and performs cleanup before exiting. It handles the overall flow of the application.

simplesect.para: Exit code indicating success or failure.

briefdescription.para: Entry point handling game initialization, launch screen display, main loop start, and shutdown.
